cause.description:
Alex Neville is an ambitious young man who is more than fit to lead the United States of America in 2024. We are here to ensure that Alex Neville, the best candidate possible, is the man running the world in 2024. Its pretty simple, he is the greatest.
---- Alex on Energy "Alternative energy? I live on campus during the school year, and walk to most of my classes. During the summer, I don't drive too often. I don't see any wrong in riding a bike every now and then, and I can't understand why some people must drive Lincoln Navigators and Hummers. Especially the H2, which is like a big metal and plastic shoebox on a pick-up truck frame. It's big, it's ugly, it's wasteful, and it can't even go offroad as well as a little Jeep could. I haven't seen the H3 yet, but at least it's supposed to be smaller.
I don't know if the problem is that we need alternative sources of energy, or that we're so careless with the sources we already have."
1. Alex Neville must be president.
2. I Craig Modelski should be his campaign manager.
3. There is no one better than Alex Neville.
cause.mission: Campaign for the Alex Neville presidency.
cause.name: Alex Neville For President Of the U.S.A. in 2024
